entry.title: ğŸ‰ Welcome to subscribe to App Store Discounts
entry.summary: Thank you for subscribing to our RSS feed. We are a community-driven project dedicated to bringing the latest App Store discount information to users worldwide. Our goal is to ensure that every user can stay up-to-date with the promotional activities of their favorite apps, whether it's price reductions on the apps themselves or limited-time promotions for in-app purchases. We will cover them all for you!
entry.content:
Thank you for subscribing to our RSS feed. We are a community-driven project dedicated to bringing the latest App Store discount information to users worldwide. Our goal is to ensure that every user can stay up-to-date with the promotional activities of their favorite apps, whether it's price reductions on the apps themselves or limited-time promotions for in-app purchases. We will cover them all for you!

About our RSS feed

  • Focused on delivering App Store app discount information
  • Whenever an app's price drops or in-app purchases go on sale, we will promptly send you a notification
  • Each app's discount information is presented in a separate feed
  • The RSS feed is completely open-source, allowing you to view, contribute, and add your favorite apps at any time

Find Us

App Store Discounts

Finally

If this project has been helpful to you, would you kindly give us a â­ï¸

entry.title: Resident Evil Village for Mac
entry.content:
Discount Informationï¼ˆPriceï¼š$39.99 â†’ $9.99 [Free ~ $39.99]ï¼‰

All Price Information

Priceï¼š$9.99

In-App Purchases

  • DLC packï¼š$9.99
  • All Access Voucherï¼š$1.99
  • Street Wolf Outfitï¼š$2.29

Application Description

Experience survival horror like never before in the 8th major installment in the Resident Evil franchise - Resident Evil Village. With detailed graphics, intense first-person action and masterful storytelling, the terror has never felt more realistic. ------------------------------------------------------------ â– In-App Purchases â– Resident Evil Village (Base Game) ãƒ»The Trauma Pack DLC ãƒ»Samurai Edge - AW Model-01 ãƒ»Resident Evil 7 Found Footage Filter ãƒ»Resident Evil 7 Tape Recorder Save Point ãƒ»Saferoom Music "Go Tell Aunt Rhody" ãƒ»Mr. Everywhere Weapon Charm ãƒ»Unlock "Village of Shadows" Difficulty ãƒ»The Tragedy of Ethan Winters Artwork ãƒ»The Baker Incident Report ãƒ»Survival Resources Pack ãƒ»Mr. Raccoon Weapon Charm â– Winters' Expansion ãƒ»Experience brand-new additional content for the award-winning modern horror masterpiece Resident Evil Village: Third Person Mode, The Mercenaries Additional Orders, and Shadows of Rose. ãƒ»Street Wolf Outfit ãƒ»Street Wolf Outfit for Rose (applies to Shadow of Rose content only) â– Extra Content Shop All Access Vouche ------------------------------------------------------------ â– By purchasing, you will be granted a license to use the product. â– A network connection is required when starting the application. â– About the End User License Agreement ãƒ»This End User License Agreement (this â€œAgreementâ€) applies to the userâ€™s use of this game software program (the â€œProgramâ€). ãƒ»THIS AGREEMENT SHALL COME INTO EFFECT BETWEEN CAPCOM CO., LTD. AND USER(S) UPON INSTALLATION OF THE PROGRAM BY THE USER. ãƒ»Those users between the ages of 13 and 18 (or between 13 and the age of legal majority in your country of residence) or a person with limited capacity shall install the Program only after obtaining approval from its parent or legal guardian who agrees to be bound by these provisions of this Agreement. Please confirm the terms above and agree to this Agreement before purchasing the Program. ------------------------------------------------------------ â– A limited part of the base game can be played for free. In order to play the full game, an in-app purchase is required. â– This game can be played without a controller, however we recommend using a controller as the game has been optimized for controller use. â– This application is approximately 35GB. Important Note: The installation process requires that you have at least twice the size of the application in free storage space available. We recommend downloading the data in an environment with good connectivity. â– Save data upload and download functionality via iCloud Drive has been added. â– Save data cannot be uploaded and downloaded between MacOS and iOS devices. â– Resident Evil Village does not support Universal Purchase. â– Purchase Precautions ãƒ»After purchase, returns (including exchange for other products/services) will not be provided for any reason. ãƒ»In-app purchases can only be used by the Apple Account that made the purchase and cannot be shared with Family Sharing members. â– Compatible OSs and Devices https://www.capcom-games.com/apple/en-us/ ------------------------------------------------------------ RESIDENT EVIL is a trademark and/or registered trademark of CAPCOM CO., LTD. and/or its subsidiaries in the U.S. and/or other countries.

Application Screenshot

iPhone

Priceï¼šFree

In-App Purchases

  • Base Gameï¼š$9.99
  • All Access Voucherï¼š$1.99
  • DLC packï¼š$9.99
  • Street Wolf Outfitï¼š$2.29

Application Description

Experience survival horror like never before in the 8th major installment in the Resident Evil franchise - Resident Evil Village. With detailed graphics, intense first-person action and masterful storytelling, the terror has never felt more realistic. ------------------------------------------------------------ â– In-App Purchases â– Resident Evil Village (Base Game) ãƒ»The Trauma Pack DLC ãƒ»Samurai Edge - AW Model-01 ãƒ»Resident Evil 7 Found Footage Filter ãƒ»Resident Evil 7 Tape Recorder Save Point ãƒ»Saferoom Music "Go Tell Aunt Rhody" ãƒ»Mr. Everywhere Weapon Charm ãƒ»Unlock "Village of Shadows" Difficulty ãƒ»The Tragedy of Ethan Winters Artwork ãƒ»The Baker Incident Report ãƒ»Survival Resources Pack ãƒ»Mr. Raccoon Weapon Charm â– Winters' Expansion ãƒ»Experience brand-new additional content for the award-winning modern horror masterpiece Resident Evil Village: Third Person Mode, The Mercenaries Additional Orders, and Shadows of Rose. ãƒ»Street Wolf Outfit ãƒ»Street Wolf Outfit for Rose (applies to Shadow of Rose content only) â– Extra Content Shop All Access Voucher ------------------------------------------------------------ â– By purchasing, you will be granted a license to use the product. â– A network connection is required when starting the application. â– About the End User License Agreement ãƒ»This End User License Agreement (this â€œAgreementâ€) applies to the userâ€™s use of this game software program (the â€œProgramâ€). ãƒ»THIS AGREEMENT SHALL COME INTO EFFECT BETWEEN CAPCOM CO., LTD. AND USER(S) UPON INSTALLATION OF THE PROGRAM BY THE USER. ãƒ»Those users between the ages of 13 and 18 (or between 13 and the age of legal majority in your country of residence) or a person with limited capacity shall install the Program only after obtaining approval from its parent or legal guardian who agrees to be bound by these provisions of this Agreement. Please confirm the terms above and agree to this Agreement before purchasing the Program. ------------------------------------------------------------ â– A limited part of the base game can be played for free. In order to play the full game, an in-app purchase is required. â– Keyboard and mouse are not supported. â– We recommend playing this game with a controller. It can be played on an iPad, but using a controller will provide a better experience. Note: Please check the Apple website for controllers compatible with iPad. Not all controllers will work as intended. â– This application is approximately 16GB. Important Note: The installation process requires that you have at least twice the size of the application in free storage space available. We recommend downloading the data in an environment with good connectivity. â– Estimated download time based on connection speed: 10Mbps - Over 3 hours 100Mbps - 30 to 40 minutes 300Mbps - 8 to 10 minutes â– Save data upload and download functionality via iCloud Drive has been added. â– Save data cannot be uploaded and downloaded between MacOS and iOS devices. â– Resident Evil Village does not support Universal Purchase. â– Purchase Precautions ãƒ»After purchase, returns (including exchange for other products/services) will not be provided for any reason. ãƒ»In-app purchases can only be used by the Apple Account that made the purchase and cannot be shared with Family Sharing members. â– Compatible OSs and Devices https://www.capcom-games.com/apple/en-us/ ------------------------------------------------------------ RESIDENT EVIL is a trademark and/or registered trademark of CAPCOM CO., LTD. and/or its subsidiaries in the U.S. and/or other countries.

Application Description

Experience survival horror like never before in the 8th major installment in the Resident Evil franchise - Resident Evil Village. With detailed graphics, intense first-person action and masterful storytelling, the terror has never felt more realistic. ------------------------------------------------------------ â– In-App Purchases â– Resident Evil Village (Base Game) ãƒ»The Trauma Pack DLC ãƒ»Samurai Edge - AW Model-01 ãƒ»Resident Evil 7 Found Footage Filter ãƒ»Resident Evil 7 Tape Recorder Save Point ãƒ»Saferoom Music "Go Tell Aunt Rhody" ãƒ»Mr. Everywhere Weapon Charm ãƒ»Unlock "Village of Shadows" Difficulty ãƒ»The Tragedy of Ethan Winters Artwork ãƒ»The Baker Incident Report ãƒ»Survival Resources Pack ãƒ»Mr. Raccoon Weapon Charm â– Winters' Expansion ãƒ»Experience brand-new additional content for the award-winning modern horror masterpiece Resident Evil Village: Third Person Mode, The Mercenaries Additional Orders, and Shadows of Rose. ãƒ»Street Wolf Outfit ãƒ»Street Wolf Outfit for Rose (applies to Shadow of Rose content only) â– Extra Content Shop All Access Vouche ------------------------------------------------------------ â– By purchasing, you will be granted a license to use the product. â– A network connection is required when starting the application. â– About the End User License Agreement ãƒ»This End User License Agreement (this â€œAgreementâ€) applies to the userâ€™s use of this game software program (the â€œProgramâ€). ãƒ»THIS AGREEMENT SHALL COME INTO EFFECT BETWEEN CAPCOM CO., LTD. AND USER(S) UPON INSTALLATION OF THE PROGRAM BY THE USER. ãƒ»Those users between the ages of 13 and 18 (or between 13 and the age of legal majority in your country of residence) or a person with limited capacity shall install the Program only after obtaining approval from its parent or legal guardian who agrees to be bound by these provisions of this Agreement. Please confirm the terms above and agree to this Agreement before purchasing the Program. ------------------------------------------------------------ â– A limited part of the base game can be played for free. In order to play the full game, an in-app purchase is required. â– This game can be played without a controller, however we recommend using a controller as the game has been optimized for controller use. â– This application is approximately 35GB. Important Note: The installation process requires that you have at least twice the size of the application in free storage space available. We recommend downloading the data in an environment with good connectivity. â– Save data upload and download functionality via iCloud Drive has been added. â– Save data cannot be uploaded and downloaded between MacOS and iOS devices. â– Resident Evil Village does not support Universal Purchase. â– Purchase Precautions ãƒ»After purchase, returns (including exchange for other products/services) will not be provided for any reason. ãƒ»In-app purchases can only be used by the Apple Account that made the purchase and cannot be shared with Family Sharing members. â– Compatible OSs and Devices https://www.capcom-games.com/apple/en-us/ ------------------------------------------------------------ RESIDENT EVIL is a trademark and/or registered trademark of CAPCOM CO., LTD. and/or its subsidiaries in the U.S. and/or other countries.

Application Description

Survival is just the beginning. Six years have passed since the biological disaster in Raccoon City. Agent Leon S. Kennedy, one of the survivors of the incident, has been sent to rescue the president's kidnapped daughter. He tracks her to a secluded European village, where there is something terribly wrong with the locals. And the curtain rises on this story of daring rescue and grueling horror where life and death, terror and catharsis intersect. Featuring modernized gameplay, a reimagined storyline, and vividly detailed graphics, Resident Evil 4 marks the rebirth of an industry juggernaut. Relive the nightmare that revolutionized survival horror. ------------------------------------------------------------ â– By purchasing, you will be granted a license to use the product. â– A network connection is required when starting the application. â– About the End User License Agreement ãƒ»This End User License Agreement (this â€œAgreementâ€) applies to the userâ€™s use of this game software program (the â€œProgramâ€). ãƒ»THIS AGREEMENT SHALL COME INTO EFFECT BETWEEN CAPCOM CO., LTD. Please confirm the terms above and agree to this Agreement before purchasing the Program. ------------------------------------------------------------ â– A limited part of the base game can be played for free. In order to play the full game, an in-app purchase is required. â– Keyboard and mouse are not supported. â– We recommend playing this game with a controller. It can be played on an iPad, but using a controller will provide a better experience. Note: Please check the Apple website for controllers compatible with iPad. Not all controllers will work as intended. â– This application is approximately 30GB. Important Note: The installation process requires that you have at least twice the size of the application in free storage space available. We recommend downloading the data in an environment with good connectivity. â– Estimated download time based on connection speed: 10Mbps - Over 6 hours 100Mbps - 30 to 40 minutes 300Mbps - 8 to 10 minutes â– Save data can be uploaded and downloaded between MacOS and iOS devices. â– Purchase Precautions ãƒ»After purchase, returns (including exchange for other products/services) will not be provided for any reason. ãƒ»In-app purchases can only be used by the Apple Account that made the purchase and cannot be shared with Family Sharing members. â– Compatible OSs and Devices https://www.capcom-games.com/apple/en-us/ ------------------------------------------------------------ RESIDENT EVIL is a trademark and/or registered trademark of CAPCOM CO., LTD. and/or its subsidiaries in the U.S. and/or other countries.

entry.title: DEATH STRANDING DIRECTOR'S CUT
entry.content:
Discount Informationï¼ˆPriceï¼š$39.99 â†’ $19.99 [$19.99 ~ $39.99]ï¼‰

All Price Information

Priceï¼š$19.99

Application Description

From legendary game creator Hideo Kojima comes a genre-defying experience, now expanded in this definitive DIRECTORâ€™S CUT. In the future, a mysterious event known as the Death Stranding has opened a doorway between the living and the dead, leading to grotesque creatures from the afterlife roaming the fallen world marred by a desolate society. As Sam Bridges, your mission is to deliver hope to humanity by connecting the last survivors of a decimated America. Can you reunite the shattered world, one step at a time? DEATH STRANDING DIRECTOR'S CUT on iOS includes a HIGH FRAME RATE, PHOTO MODE, and cross-over content from Valve Corporation's HALF-LIFE series and CD Projekt Red's Cyberpunk 2077. Stay connected with players around the globe with the Social Strand Systemâ„¢. Mac and iOS â€¢ Sign-in to iCloud and activation of iCloudDrive are required to play this product. â€¢ This product can be played offline, but a network connection is required to fully experience the Social Strand Systemâ„¢. Communication fees will be incurred during online play. Only for iOS version â€¢ When playing this product for the first time, you will be required to download additional data. You can start the game once you have downloaded approximately 13 GB, but additional downloads will occur as the game progresses, requiring a total of approximately 50 GB of downloads. Additional downloads will occur when additional language voice data is used. FAQs https://505.games/DSDCAppStoreFAQ

All Price Information

Priceï¼šFree

  • 48 Gemsï¼š$28.99
  • 150 Gemsï¼š$79.99

  • 28 Gemsï¼š$14.99

Application Description

Become a Legend! Capture over 2000 Animated Monsters and Duel in Real-Time PvP! Form your team and battle for victory! Capture, train, and evolve to become the champion in one of the biggest monster battling RPGs! Neo Monsters is an addictive strategy RPG that features epic 4v4 battles between two teams of up to 16 monsters. The unique turn-based battle system allows you to come up with powerful chain strategies by combining hundreds of abilities. Hunt down the strongest monsters and harness their power, then take the battle online to dominate in exciting PvP battles and leagues! Are you ready to take the challenge? â–¶Features: â— Build your Monster Collection â€¢ Capture and evolve over 1000 fully animated monsters! â€¢ Train your monsters and unleash their deadly potential. â€¢ Collect evolution ingredients to create the ultimate power! â— Form a Battle Strategy â€¢ Build the ultimate team of up to 16 monsters. â€¢ Defeat your opponents in epic turn-based 4v4 battles! â€¢ Create devastating combinations from hundreds of abilities. â— Become the Champion â€¢ Conquer six Leagues and take on the Grand Champion in 60+ hours of adventure! â€¢ Explore multiple islands and dungeons on your journey. â€¢ Follow the story to uncover the truth behind your late uncleâ€™s atrocity. â— Take the Battle Online â€¢ Duel players from around the world in PvP leagues! â€¢ Complete 100+ online missions. â€¢ Take on weekly updated events to unlock big rewards. Follow us on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/NeoMonstersOfficial/ Join the Neo Monsters community: http://www.neomonstersforum.com/ Issues or questions? Contact our support: neomonsupport.gameplay@zigzagame.net Terms of Service: https://www.zigzagame.com/terms/ Privacy Policy: https://www.zigzagame.com/privacy-policy/

entry.content:

  • 175,000 PP for OOTP Go 26!ï¼š$99.99

  • 75,000 PP for OOTP Go 26!ï¼š$49.99
  • 5,500 PP for OOTP Go 26!ï¼š$4.99

Application Description

Take the beloved Out of the Park Baseball series with you wherever you go. The award-winning baseball simulation game is now in your hands wherever you are in the world! Manage teams, control any franchise in 2025 or throughout MLB History, build and draft your Perfect Team, build a completely fictional baseball universe and so much more. You can oversee your league at a high level or play out each game in the gorgeous 3D game mode, managing play by play or even pitch by pitch. OOTP has it all covered. Play Your Way Â· Franchise Mode: A single-player oriented mode where you can run your favorite MLB, KBO, international or fictional baseball organization. 2025 MLB and 2025 KBO seasons - with accurate teams, schedules, and rosters - are included! Plus! 1927, 1984, and 2014 MLB seasons also included. Â· Perfect Team Mode: Build a dynasty in this online mode competing against players around the world. Manage MLB History Â· Gain access to historical MLB leagues and rosters from 1901 - 2024 Â· Simulate any and all MLB scenarios and games that you have dreamt of Â· Manage all on-field decisions and strategies Â· Draft, scout, trade, and sign players to build a powerhouse Official MLB & KBO Licenses Â· Full 2025 rosters from both MLB & KBO franchises free with game purchase Â· Includes full MLB and MiLB rosters Create Your Perfect Team Â· Create your own custom team to pit against players around the world Â· Cross-platform compatibility with Out of the Park Baseball 26 users Â· Pull and collect player cards from the vast player pool available Â· Compete in tournaments against other players to see who has the best team New This Year Â· Full Scouting System: Improve scouting accuracy on players, develop reports, choose priorities, assign scouting budgets, and more Â· 3D Upgrades: New dynamic scoreboard, custom randomized fictional park generation Â· Roster, AI, and Engine: Greatly improved AI, added more variety and detail in players ratings by expanding the internal scale Â· KBO Improvements: Added military service time and free agent cash compensation Â· Perfect Team Notifications: New settings all you to choose what to receive push notifications about Â· Perfect Team Clubhouse Stars: Purchase exclusive cards and pack bundles with these Stars; earned through tournaments, Perfect Draft, and league play. Â· Perfect Team Variants: New and revamped boosted-card mechanic, with a more user friendly way to boost; "feed as you go" Â· And more! OOTP Go 26 comes with an additional three historical MLB seasons for FREE! Run any franchise from the 1927, 1984, and 2014 MLB seasons. All other historical MLB seasons (1901-2024) available for purchase. Major League and MiLB trademarks and copyrights are used with permission of Major League Baseball. Officially Licensed Product â€“ MLB Players, Inc. PLAYERS CHOICEÂ® Out of the Park Developments Â© Copyright 2025. All Rights Reserved * Access permission notice for gameplay Â· STORAGE: The permission is required to store game data and will not access personal files such as photos. Â· MEMORY: Recommended system minimum of 2 GB RAM Â· PHONE: The permission is required to proceed with in-game events and rewards and will not affect calls. Â· CONTACTS: The permission is required to sync your friend list and Google Account. â€» You'll be able to enjoy the service except features related to above authorities even if you don't give permission to the above. "Consumer Information: â€¢ Language support: English, í•œêµ­ì–´ â€¢ Items are available for purchase in this game. Some paid items may not be refundable depending on the type of item. â€¢ For Com2uS Mobile Game Terms of Service, visit http://www.withhive.com/. - Terms of Service : http://terms.withhive.com/terms/policy/view/M9/T1 - Privacy Policy : http://terms.withhive.com/terms/policy/view/M9/T3 â€¢ For questions or customer support, please contact our Customer Support by visiting https://support.ootpdevelopments.com/portal/en/home
